item.title: Feasting upon the Words of Christ
item.description:
Feasting upon the Words of Christ by Elder Takashi Wada, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 189th Annual General Conference on Sun Mar 31 2019
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Takashi Wada, Of the Seventy

item.title: The Words of Christ and the Holy Ghost Will Lead Us to the Truth
item.description:
The Words of Christ and the Holy Ghost Will Lead Us to the Truth by Elder Takashi Wada, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 194th Semiannual General Conference on Mon Sep 30 2024
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
